answers.answer: this is not the doctor's forum...sorryi can tell you that how soon your doctor calls you about any test results is up to his office protocol...this is not a universal standard.   call "his" office and ask them...we have no way of knowing his office procedures.

question: Hello Dr. I am 27 weeks pregnant and on apr.1 took a hiv test and for gestation diabetes test at the same time. I am worried that up to now my doctor hasn't call me for the result of the test if it came positive or negative on the tests. I was wondering if they will call you right away if they found out it came positive or they will tell me on my next dr.s visit. just worried sick and scared to call the office to find out. Pls I need some advice. thank you.
title: WorriedPreggygirl
